com.sk89q.worldedit.internal

Class ServerInterfaceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.extension.platform.AbstractPlatform
      • com.sk89q.worldedit.ServerInterface
        • com.sk89q.worldedit.internal.ServerInterfaceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Platform

    public class ServerInterfaceAdapter
extends ServerInterface
    Adapts Platforms into the legacy ServerInterface.
